name: Figma Workshop (IDE Winter School 2022)
description:
This Figma file was created for a workshop at the IDE Winter School 2022 "Digital Editions - Interface Design".


The material introduces the user interface as well as the basic features of Figma and demonstrates the design process from pen & paper wireframes to prototyping. As an accompanying example, a navigation bar composed of several subcomponents is realized step by step.


This is guided by the included slides, which can be used both as a presentation and as an experimentation canvas.
